name: Smoothies & Shakes!
description:
Fruit Fanatics, Veggie Nuts, Sweet Lovers or Go’n Green...We've got your fix! Create your own virtual Smoothie from scratch!

25 of the all-time favorite Sorbet and Yogurt flavors…
Mango, Cantaloupe, Cherry, Raspberry, Apple, Blueberry, Grape, Lemon, Peach, Strawberry, Lime, Granny Smith Apple, Pineapple, Grapefruit, Orange, Vanilla, Chocolate and Soy Yogurt, too, plus more.

24 Scrumptious Syrups…
Caramel, Maple, Chocolate, Toasted Marshmallow, Coffee, Honey, Vanilla, Pumpkin Pie, Banana, Cinnamon, Cherry, Peach, Pear, Strawberry, Apple, Mango, Pineapple, Coconut, Orange, Blackberry, Kiwi, Cranberry, Blueberry and Peppermint.

30 Juices, Milks, Teas and Coffee…
Papaya, Coconut, Orange, Pomegranate, Apple, Lime, Pear, Grape, Mango, Peach, Guava, Strawberry, Aloe Vera, Pineapple, Blueberry, Tomato, Lemon, Green Tea, Chai Tea, Coffee, Soy Milk, Sweetened Condensed Milk, Rice Milk, Chocolate Milk, Almond Milk and Egg Nog and more.

More than 50 Fruits, Veggies, Protein Powders , Tofu, Cottage Cheese and Spice choices to take your love of Smoothies about as far as it can go without a marriage certificate…
Blueberries, Apricots, Blackberries, Peaches, Cantaloupe, Pears, Raspberries, Kiwi, Bananas, Strawberries, Mango, Pineapple, Coconut, Apples, Papaya, Tangerine, Raisins, Watermelon, Honeydew Melon, Pumpkin, Cucumbers, Baby Carrots, Avocado, Celery, Tomatoes, Cilantro, Broccoli, Romaine Lettuce, Spinach, Parsley, Fresh Mint, Kale, Dandelion Greens, Vanilla Soy Protein Powder, Vanilla Protein Powder, Tofu, Cottage Cheese, Fresh Barley Grass, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, Ground Cloves, Brown and White Sugar Cubes and many more.

And 45 specials to top off your Smoothie…
16 flavors of Whipped Cream, and 29 Sprinkle flavors and Candy toppings!

There are 30 backgrounds to choose from, including Spring and Summer themes.

To make your Sweet, Fruit & Veggie, or Classic Smoothie...
Fill up your Blender with as little or as much as you'd like.
Add Juice, MIlk, Coffee or Tea
Add Ice Cubes
and Mix… Six speeds for your blending pleasure... including a Pulse Button. Choose from Thick & Chunky to Thin & Smooth.
Choose from 180 Glass styles and colors.
Pour your Smoothie.
Drop in a straw (add as many as you like) and sip all that creamy, deliciousness right down.

Channel your inner artist and create your own signature smoothie…
You can share it via Email it or save it to your photo library.

To our fans....A huge thank you for your great support, suggestions and for the appreciation of the hard work and love that goes into making our games.

We are dedicated to providing you with updates that always add new content and improve your experience. You can buy in confidence knowing we support our apps.

Check out our other fun food apps:
* Cupcakes! FREE
* Cookie Pops FREE
* French Fries! FREE
* Giant Cookies! FREE
* Milkshakes & More! FREE
* Ice Cream Floats FREE
* A Soup & Salad Maker FREE
* Ice Cream! Our Mega Hit with over 2,500,000 downloads! And it's FREE!
